  • Constructor Details

    • LimeLightCamera

      public LimeLightCamera(String name, int colIndex, BooleanSupplier megatagChooser)
      Constructor with megatag chooser for AprilTags
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the camera, 'limelight-' will be prepended to the name
      colIndex - the column index of the display tab
      megatagChooser - boolean supplier to choose between M1 and M2 for pose estimation

    • LimeLightCamera

      public LimeLightCamera(String name, int colIndex)
      Constructor without megatag chooser, M1 is always chosen
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the camera, 'limelight-' will be prepended to the name
      colIndex - the column index of the display tab

    • LimeLightCamera

      public LimeLightCamera(String name, int colIndex, edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform3d cameraToRobot, BooleanSupplier megatagChooser)
      Constructor with megatag chooser for AprilTags or targets
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the camera, 'limelight-' will be prepended to the name
      colIndex - the column index of the display tab
      cameraToRobot - the camera position relative to the robot's center
      megatagChooser - boolean supplier to choose between M1 and M2 for pose estimation

    • LimeLightCamera

      public LimeLightCamera(String name, int colIndex, edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform3d cameraToRobot)
      Constructor for targeting cameras without megatag chooser
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the camera, 'limelight-' will be prepended to the name
      colIndex - the column index of the display tab
      cameraToRobot - the camera position relative to the robot's center
